channel.title: Compiler cannot find path
channel.description: Hi guys, I am new and I was trying to work on learning to just edit and just use a RSPS. I downloaded the source and client and when I try to use the compiler it says this "The system cannot find the path specified". If you guys could help me figure out how to edit it and apply the changes so I can make the compiler work, so I can edit and make the changes go through that would be amazing.

item.title: Compiler cannot find path
item.dc:creator: @Viva_La_Ace Viva La Ace
item.description:
@Viva_La_Ace wrote:

Welliton_inc:

Your JDK version is incorrect.

you can find your jdk version at C:\Program Files\Java or C:\Program Files (x86)\Java

once you have done that, right click your compiler and change your jdk version to the one that you have.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler cannot find path
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

Your JDK version is incorrect.

Read full topic
